comment:
* Autofill options for a given package. * *

This object is created by the Autofill System Service and passed back to the app when the * application is created. * * @hide

variables.name: compatModeEnabled
variables.comment: * Whether compatibility mode is enabled for the package.

variables.name: augmentedAutofillEnabled
variables.comment: * Whether package is allowlisted for augmented autofill.

variables.name: appDisabledExpiration
variables.comment: * The package disable expiration by autofill service.

variables.name: disabledActivities
variables.comment:
* The disabled Activities of the package. key is component name string, value is when they
     * will be enabled.

methods.name: public boolean isAugmentedAutofillEnabled(@NonNull Context context)
methods.comment: * Returns whether activity is allowlisted for augmented autofill.

methods.name: public boolean isAutofillDisabledLocked(@NonNull ComponentName componentName)
methods.comment:
* Returns if autofill is disabled by service to the given activity.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
